episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 9 - When Faith Fails the Innocent: Sex, Secrets, and Hypocrisy in the Cult
episodes.description: In one of our most unfiltered episodes yet, we peel back the layers of sexual hypocrisy in the cult we escaped—and expose how silence protects predators. From the chilling story of Amy, a young girl abused by her own father, to the outrageous deception involving a traveling Christian ministry and “sperm therapy,” we reveal how easily immorality gets swept under the rug when it’s done in the name of God. Join us as we share not just the trauma, but the power that comes from finally telling the truth. If you’ve ever struggled to speak up, felt silenced by religion, or questioned the systems meant to protect you—this is for you. And if you're still healing, just know: you’re not alone. ⚠️ Trigger warning: This episode discusses sexual abuse, religious manipulation, and child grooming. Wicked Confessions Uncensored Website | Tiktok | Facebook | Instagram | Email

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 8 - He Died… and So Did My Marriage: The Truth About Polygamy After Death
episodes.description: When a man in a polygamous cult dies, what really happens to the women he leaves behind? In this episode of Wicked Confessions Uncensored, Vera and Pamela break down the hidden aftermath of death in the colony—and how “religious duty” was often used to justify predatory behavior, spiritual manipulation, and power plays within sister wife families. This episode dives into what really went down at Horace’s funeral, how a so-called “meek and mild” widow reshaped the entire family dynamic, and how Vera discovered that everything she believed in was built on blurred lines and betrayal. ⚠️ Warning: This episode includes themes of manipulation, spiritual hypocrisy, and emotional trauma—told with raw honesty and a hint of gallows humor. Wicked Confessions Uncensored Website | Tiktok | Facebook | Instagram | Email

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 7 - The Dark Side of Polygamy: When “God’s Will” Becomes Control
episodes.description: This episode of Wicked Confessions Uncensored dives into one of the hardest stories we’ve ever shared. We’re shedding light on how spiritual manipulation and cult dynamics can enable deeply damaging behavior—especially when it comes to young girls being conditioned under the guise of “celestial marriage.” This isn’t just a story about polygamy. It’s about silence, brainwashing, power, and the fight to reclaim your worth. Vera and Pamela discuss how the inner critic (aka the “Head Bitch”) shows up during these traumatic experiences—and how to break free from it. Trigger warning: This episode involves topics surrounding control, manipulation, and underage marriage. Listen with care—and as always, listen to your heart, not the bitch in your head. ❤️ Wicked Confessions Uncensored Website | Tiktok | Facebook | Instagram | Email

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 6 - When Loyalty Gets Twisted: A Widow’s Wild Ride in Polygamy Beliefs, Sister Wives, and the Lies We’re Taught
episodes.description: In this jaw-dropping episode of Wicked Confessions Uncensored, we share the unbelievable true story of one woman, several husbands, and how cult beliefs blurred every line between loyalty, survival, and scandal. This one’s got it all: forbidden relationships, blurred sisterhood boundaries, and the deep programming that convinced women their worth—and even their salvation—depended on a man. 💔 We break it all down, reflect on how our inner critic (aka the head voice we call “the inner bully”) shows up in moments of betrayal, shame, and survival mode, and remind you: you’re allowed to question everything you were taught. 🎧 Tune in for truth, healing, and a whole lot of “wait… WHAT?!” moments. episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 5 - Me, My Husband, and the Sex Miracle: Finding Two New Brides
episodes.description: This week, we dive into the twisted tale of Lola, the prophet’s widow who became a matchmaker to reignite her own marriage. You heard that right – Lola thought the key to keeping her husband interested was to find him not one but two new brides! From matchmaking to midlife crises, darkened rooms to council meetings about hickeys, beyond the chaos and comedy, we dig deep into how the inner bitch played a role in Lola’s relentless pursuit of validation through men. Tune in for a raw, real, and hilarious look at how misguided beliefs can shape a person’s life and the hard lessons that come when trying to silence that critical inner voice. And don’t miss next week’s episode – "Death Can’t Come Fast Enough for a Woman in Heat" – where things get even juicier! Wicked Confessions Uncensored Website | Tiktok | Facebook | Instagram | Email

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 4 - Artificial Insemination: Polygamy Style
episodes.description: Ever wonder what happens when religious zealotry, sexual manipulation, and a desperate desire for motherhood collide in a cult? This week on Wicked Confessions Uncensored, Pamela and Vera dive deep into the jaw-dropping true story of Brother Parker, a self-proclaimed man of God who "generously" offered to help a fellow convert by impregnating his wife — all in the name of righteousness, of course. 🙄 In this wild ride through 1960s polygamous Mexico, we unravel the twisted logic, sexual hypocrisy, and emotional manipulation that kept women stuck—and men playing gods. As always, we check in with the head bitch (aka your inner critic) to uncover how these stories reflect deeper patterns of control, fear, and self-doubt that still show up in our lives today. 💬 If you've ever battled with the voice in your head that whispers “you don’t deserve it” or “you have to be perfect”, this episode will have you laughing, gasping, and thinking deeper about the BS that holds us back. We expose the truth, drop the shame, and remind you that you’re not crazy—you were just programmed. Let’s deconstruct that programming together. 💪 Wicked Confessions Uncensored Website | Tiktok | Facebook | Instagram | Email

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 3 - Breaking the Chains: Love, Lies, and the Inner Critic
episodes.description: Welcome back to Wicked Confessions Uncensored! In this episode, Vera and Pamela dive into the twisted realities of love and control inside the cult. From being married off young and completely clueless about sex to witnessing the bizarre rules of widowhood, this conversation gets raw and real. What happens when you're told you're never enough? That you don’t deserve love unless you play by their rules? We break down how the inner critic thrives in environments of shame and control—keeping women stuck, silenced, and believing they aren’t worthy of more. It's time to break free, reclaim your voice, and stop letting that voice in your head run the show. Buckle up, because this one's a wild ride. episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 2 - Polygamy Exposed: The Wife, The Husband & The Lie
episodes.description: Ever heard of holy sex? In this wild episode of Wicked Confessions Uncensored, we dive into one of the most bizarre, hypocritical, and yes—darkly hilarious—stories from our time in a polygamous cult. A devoted wife, a righteous husband, and a new sister wife take "missionary style" to a whole new level… but not in the way you'd expect. This story exposes the cracks in the cult’s rules, the lies women were forced to believe, and how the bitch in your head (your inner critic) convinces you to accept the unacceptable. It’s messy, it’s raw, and it’s real. 🚨 Buckle up for jaw-dropping twists, unexpected humor, and a reality check on how these belief systems break women down.
